name: Eden Harvest
description:
Edit 01/12/2023: Bug fix, the game was ending after delivering one flower

Edit 01/13/2023: Bug fix, the game now starts in the plot screen and the light usage now works correctly on HTML! 

Some people can't continue the great journey when they die. Their soul withers and loses all color. Death created a gardener to bring some color back to them, regrowth them, and harvest them to the next step. 

As the gardener, use WASD to move and spacebar to talk to the souls/deliver the flower.

BG music: FLOWERS FOR THE DEAD from BLACK ROSE (EP) by Rainy Days for Ghosts, bought in a humble bundle.
